projects.name: Amivoice Operator Helping System [Web Application for Call Center]

projects.name: Sensitive Data Masking
projects.description: Mask and protect sensitive data, e.g. Customer's Personal ID, Credit card number, from speeach recognition results.

projects.name: Speech Analytic -- Root cause and Trend Analysis
projects.description: Root cause and Trend Analysis from speech recoginition results. Analyze data from customer's experience what they're looking for, most frequent requested/asked, top issue raised. Report the root couse analysis and speech pattern graphically.
